subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Raja Rai Singh in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में राजा राय सिंह ने किस प्राचीन फोट किया।
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal, also known as the Palace of Winds, is a famous monument in Jaipur built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II.
explanation_hi: हवा महाल, महाराजा सौवा जयसिंह आत्मन के कालता जी मंगल को कैलसीना के बाणी इंगल को नौकरनी कालता जी मंगल
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal, also known as the Palace of Winds, is a popular monument in Jaipur built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II. The Kalan Chowk of Jaipur is not related to Galta Ji Temple.
explanation_hi: हवा महाल, पार्वती कालता जी मंगल को नवसीना कालता जी मंगल
explanation_en: Kalan Chowk of Jaipur is a famous square known for its narrow lanes and bustling market. The Galta Ji Temple in Jaipur is a Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Sun God. These questions are related to Jaipur, not Galta Ji Temple.
explanation_hi: जयपुर की कालता जी मंगल, को नवसीना कालता जी मंगल
explanation_en: Kalan Chowk is a popular place in Jaipur famous for its narrow lanes and bustling market. Kalan Ji Temple is a temple dedicated to Lord Hanuman and located in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: जयपुर की कालता जी मंगल, नवसीना कालता जी मंगल
explanation_en: Galta Ji Temple is a famous Hindu temple in Jaipur dedicated to Lord Sun God. The Nawasiya Kalan Ji Temple in Jaipur is not related to this question.
explanation_hi: जयपुर की नवसीना कालता जी मंगल, राजस्थान जी मंगल
explanation_en: Kalan Chowk is a historic place in Jaipur. Galta Ji Temple is dedicated to Lord Sun God and located in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: जयपुर की नवसीना कालता जी मंगल, राजस्थान जी मंगल
explanation_en: Galta Ji Temple is a historic temple in Jaipur known for its natural hot springs. The Nawasiya Kalan Ji Temple in Jaipur is not related to this question.
